full_summary:
# Supply of Hardware and Software for Equipment Monitoring System

* **Reference Number**: 1000254353
* **Contracting Officer**: Eryn Mathers (eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca, 613-298-2804)
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Closing Date**: 2023-12-29T14:00:00 (UTC)

## Brief Overview

The Department of Health Canada (Health Canada) is seeking a supplier for laboratory environmental conditioning equipment. The solicitation documents have been published on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS), with a limit of 40 calendar days.

## Requirements

* **Laboratory Environmental Conditioning Equipment**: The contractor will be required to supply hardware and software for the equipment monitoring system.
* **Pre-Qualification Criteria**: Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI are invited to submit a bid. Fournisseurs seulement présentement pré-qualifiés sur l'arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement E60PV-19EQUI ont été invitée.
*   **Nature of Requirements**: Mandatory technical criteria include software and hardware specifications for the equipment monitoring system.

## Evaluation Criteria

* **Mandatory Technical Criteria**: Suppliers that do not meet the mandatory technical criteria will not be evaluated.
* **Agreement ID**: Suppliers must hold a Supply arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada.
*   **Pre-qualification Period**: Suppliers can pre-qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for laboratory and scientific equipment at any time.



Post-Expiration Action  

*   Any bids received from suppliers not pre-qualiféd on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated.
*   The responsive bidder, already holding the required Supply Arrangement, with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.  

Region of Delivery

*   The region of delivery for this project is the National Capital Region (NCR)

Attachments
----------

- English version of the solicitation document can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27596/npp-english-1000254353.pdf
- French version of the solicitation document can be found at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27596/npp-french-100025
